raw_body: ABEYWICKRAMA – DR. GAMINI – Son of late Andrew and Lisbeth Abeywickrama (Baddegama),​ beloved brother of Kenneth Abeywickrama (deceased),​ Dr. Indrani Abeywickrama (deceased) and Senaka Abeywickrama,​ brother-in-law of Bernie and Naomi,​ uncle of Sidhat and Priyam,​ Dushyanthi,​ Shanaka,​ Paul,​ grand uncle of Radhika,​ Aditya and Menik,​ passed away peacefully in London,​ UK on 26th August 2023. Funeral services in London,​ to be announced.054007
